casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Trimble Village, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Trimble Village v. Indus. Comm. (2001), 93 Ohio St.3d 498.]

(No. 01-556 Submitted September 18, 2001 Decided October 31, 2001.) Ward, Kaps, Bainbridge, Maurer & Melvin and Matthew A Weller, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Lisa R. Miller, Assistant Attorney General, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the decision of the Industrial Commission is reinstated.

Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Douglas and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
